lead_paragraph: Antonio Pettigrew agreed to return the Olympic relay gold medal he won in 2000 after admitting to doping during the Sydney Games. During the trial of the former track coach Trevor Graham, Pettigrew last month admitted to using EPO and human growth hormone from 1997 to 2003. Graham was found guilty of lying to federal investigators about his relationship to a steroids dealer.
